Matgraph Samples

From this page, you can view some sample Matgraph sessions. These samples are designed to give a general overview of how to use Matgraph.

  • Graph coloring
  • Hamiltonian cycles
  • Eulerian tours
  • Bipartite matching
  • Spanning trees
  • Isomorphism
  • Cayley graphs
  • Maximum clique and independent set [lower bound on the Ramsey number R(4)]
  • Domination
  • Vertex partitioning
  • Partitions
  • Permutations

After you have viewed one of these page, press the BACK arrow in your browser to return to this page.
